img_text: Haejoon: hello F: (give flower crown to haeioon) this is yours. H: there are 3 flowers? F: what? There are two H: (count the ones on flowers) 12 (pointing at fan) 3 F: ah oppa if you flirt at me like that i can't sleep H: don't sleep have a phone call with me F: if that's the case give me your number H: i know your number so wait for it
